# reportSpam(_:)

**Instance Method**

Reports an SMS message as spam to the carrier and to partners.

## Declaration

```swift
final func reportSpam(_ message: SMSMessage) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **message**: [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/SMSMessage] to report as spam.
